Headline: #95 95th and #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute near 92nd/Exchange
ShortDescription: 95 95th and 30 South Chicago buses temporarily rerouted due to, street blockage near 92nd/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

#95 95th and #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 92nd/Exchange, due to street blockage near 92nd/Exchange.

#95 95th buses will operate via 93rd, South Chicago, Commercial, 92nd and over regular route .

#30 South Chicago buses will operate via South Chicago, 91st, Commercial, 92nd and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute near State/Huron
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses temp. rerouted NB: State, Ontario, LaSalle, Division and Clark; SB: Clark, Ohio and State: due to police activity near State/Huron.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near State/Huron, due to police activity near State/Huron.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Ontario, LaSalle, Division, Clark and over regular route.

Southbound buses will operate via Clark, Ohio, State and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.
